summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

summary.span: 如果可以将指定的字符串成功地分析为 WQL 查询，则认为该字符串是查询字符串；否则，将假定它是查询的源对象的路径。

span.span: If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.

summary.span: 在此情况下，假定该查询为实例查询。

span.span: In this case, the query is assumed to be an instances query.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示只返回相关关系对象的类定义。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示只返回相关关系对象的类定义。

span.span: Returns a value indicating that only the class definitions of the relevant relationship objects be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 作为副作用，将重新生成查询字符串以反映新标志。As a side-effect, the query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 如果查询只请求结果集的类定义，则为; 否则为。否则，`false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此查询是架构查询还是实例查询。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instance query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值指示此查询是否为架构查询。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether this query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的查询类型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 属性值Property Value `true` 是否应对架构计算此查询;`false` 是否应对实例计算查询。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 部分信任的程式碼無法使用此成員。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](/dotnet/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code).
